#summary Generic TA-Lib Integration (over 200 indicators)

[http://ta-lib.org/ TA-Lib] can be used to perform technical analysis of financial market data.

 * Includes 200 indicators such as ADX, MACD, RSI, Stochastic, Bollinger Bands etc... (more info)
 * Candlestick pattern recognition

Through this Generic AggregateFunction all TA-Lib 

To use the AggregateFunction add the following to the esper configuration 

{{{
<plugin-aggregation-function name="talib" function-class="com.algoTrader.util.GenericTALibFunction"/>
}}}
 
The AggregationFunction can be used in an esper statement like this: 

{{{
select talib("stochF", high, low, close, 3, 2, "Sma")
from OHLCBar;
}}}
 
If the TA-Lib Function returns just one value, the value is directly exposed by the AggregationFunction. If the TA-Lib Function returns multiple-values, they will be exposed by a Map 

The AggregationFunction needs the following libraries: 

 * [http://commons.apache.org/collections Apache Commons Collection]
 * [http://larvalabs.com/collections Commons Generics] 
 * [http://ta-lib.org/ TA-Lib]

The source code of the GenericTALibFunction can be found here: [http://code.google.com/p/cep-trader/source/browse/trunk/AlgoTraderLight/src/com/algoTrader/util/GenericTALibFunction.java GenericTALibFunction.java]
